altername_name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva 2nd Arcade Debut Pack
初音ミク −Project DIVA− 2nd お買い得版
name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva 2nd#
overview: This updated version of Project Diva 2nd released alongside Project Diva Extend, and came as a download code with the physical release, or was added to your account with a digital purchase of extend. This version includes the updated features from Extend, alongside other additions and improvements, such as new costumes. This version also has performance improvements compared to the original version.
